post.body: the new site looks great - way to go!

yah 10lb is can be light for swings but depends on the movement - http://www.getkbells.com/ has a unique approach for using a 4lb
(with)out instruction? i usually reco 12-20lb depending on current condition and usually reco two (8lb & 16lb) for female begnnrs
it looks great! Congrats!
